## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                   | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `address` | `address`  | The address of the order processor            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `chain`   | `chain`    | The name of the chain for the order processor | `string` | `undefined` |
| `orderId` | `order-id` | The order id to use                           | `string` | `undefined` |
